category.name: wcf.acp.option
category.item: Enable automatic deletion of unconfirmed users
If this option is enabled, unconfirmed users will be automatically deleted after the specified number of days.
Days until resending activation email
Number of days after registration after which the activation email will be resent. If set to 0, no email will be resent and users will be deleted directly after the configured days.
Days until unconfirmed users are deleted
Number of days after which unconfirmed users are automatically deleted. If the resend option is enabled, this count starts from the time the email was resent.
Users per cron job execution

Defines the maximum number of users that can be processed per cron job execution to reduce server load. This limit applies to both resending activation emails and deleting users who have already received a reminder email.
Email notification when sending reminder emails
If this option is enabled, administrators will be notified via email when reminder activation emails are sent to unconfirmed users.
Email notification when deleting users
If this option is enabled, administrators will be notified via email when unconfirmed users are automatically deleted.
